Class MovieRecommenderEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • recommendationevaluation.MovieRecommenderEngine

  • public class MovieRecommenderEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a RecommenderEngine for movie recommendations.

      Constructor for a MovieRecommenderEngine creates a RecommenderEngine based upon a neighbourhood size.
